# HealthEndpointOptions.XmlRootElementName property

Gets or sets the root element name used when emitting XML output. Defaults to `Response`. Ignored for non-XML output types. If null or whitespace a default of `Response` is used.

```csharp
public string? XmlRootElementName { get; set; }
```
